titleStmt.title: A godly new ballad, intituled, a dozen of points. A dozen of point you may here read, whereon each Christians soul may feed.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere and w. Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Glasgow University Library.
With: The angell Gabriell, his salutation to the blessed Virgin Mary. [London] : Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere and W. Gilbertson, [between 1658 and 1664].
